file_content.text: Thank you for speaking with us.
May we speak? We have questions.
Your Republic is unknown to us. Why have you come to Voss?
Your world is in danger. We don't want you to come to harm.
To protect you.
What danger? I don't understand.
You speak of the Empire. What do they seek here?
We wish to understand your people's unique connection to the Force.
To learn from you.
Voss is a tactical resource in a galaxy-wide war. We have to protect you.
To defend you.
This isn't a matter we are familiar with.
I do work with the Republic, but I'm no expert on their plans here.
I'm just a freelance pilot.
Hmm. That is disappointing.
We need to understand why you do things as you do.
To learn.
We do things as they must be done.
You've learned some of the ways of the Force. We'll show you the rest.
We're going to educate you.
We do not use this Force you speak of.
The Republic just wants to invite you into our great galactic society.
We want you to join us.
You wish our involvement in outsider concerns.
We're all just here to make friends and help each other out.
The Republic wants to help.
You wish to aid us? Encouraging.
I can't say.
Why hide your purpose?
And the Empire? What do they seek on Voss?
The Empire is only concerned with making themselves more powerful.
Their own dominance.
The Empire will try to twist you into something you're not. Something evil.
They want to corrupt you.
The Imps try to put everything they see under their grasp.
They want to control you.
When the Empire sees something they want, they try to grab it. Period.
They want to take everything.
Then we should avoid them.
The Sith Empire will take what they want and burn your world to cinders!
Total destruction!
The Empire is merely a tool for Sith conquests.
The Sith will destroy you!
The Imps will kill you, enslave your children and strip this planet bare unless you stop them.
You should be fighting them.
They're going to blast this whole place into rubble! Run while you can!
Chaos and destruction!
Horrifying! How can this be true?
The Three will guide us, as they always have. But we will remember your words.
Don't ask me.
We will ask no more questions.
Goodbye.
Greetings.
